item.title: about
item.description:
About Me

I’m a student at Drexel pursuing a Bachelor’s of Science in Computer Science. I’ve been programming since middle school, and now want to formalize that knowledge and turn it in to a career. You can read more about me and some of the project’s I’m working on below, as well as by clicking my github and LinkedIn links above.
